articles.title: $80 Billion Brazilian Investment Bank Launches Bitcoin and Crypto Trading App
articles.description: Brazilian investment bank BTG Pactual becomes first large financial institution in Brazil to enable customers to make direct investments in Bitcoin.

articles.title: Bitcoin at $40,000, Ethereum at $2,800 Very Important Levels to Watch Now: Mike Novogratz
articles.description: Head of Galaxy Digital Mike Novogratz explains what levels are important for BTC and Ether now that the Chinese real-estate monster crisis is hitting the crypto market

price.title: Get cryptocurrency price
